title: Sandown Beach
description: Beautiful sandy beach with facilities for families.

title: Compton Bay
description: Popular surfing spot with stunning cliffs.

title: Colwell Bay
description: Quaint beach with crystal-clear waters and nearby cafes.

title: Yaverland Beach
description: Great spot for fossil hunting and coastal walks.

title: Freshwater Bay
description: Scenic beach surrounded by towering cliffs.

title: Ventnor Beach
description: Charming seaside town with a sandy beach and Victorian architecture.

title: Shanklin Beach
description: Family-friendly beach with a traditional promenade.

title: St Helens Beach
description: Relaxing beach with views of Bembridge Harbour.

title: Ryde Beach
description: Long sandy beach with an amusement pier and seafront attractions.

title: Cowes Beach
description: Historic seaside town known for sailing and regattas.
